revised_title: A Case Study of Stones Voided by Stoole: The Formation and Treatment
tldr: This article discusses a case study of a patient who experienced pain and discomfort due to stones voided by stool. The author, Dr. W. Holbrooke, explains the possible formation of these stones and suggests a treatment plan involving gentle purgatives and emollient glysters. The article also touches upon the possible formation of bezoar stones in animals.
